title: (RESOLVED) [Aug 23] Patching Errors... for a patch we haven't released yet?
body:
>#Update 7:03pm:

> This should now be 100% resolved for NA.  For other regions, we are still investigating a full resolution.

>If you are in NA and still experiencing Patching Issues, it is probably a different issue altogether!  Be sure to check out our [Help and Support Board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/osqw6G4M) or our [Support Site](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) for help!

------------------------------

>#Update 5:15pm:

> We believe we narrowed down the root cause of this issue: There was a misconfiguration on the Patcher Servers for players on either Windows XP and Windows 10.  Essentially, anytime you boot up the patcher, it checks to see if you have the latest patch.  With the misconfiguration, it would instantly pop-up an error message the moment it checks, regardless if you have the latest patch.

>We're still heads down working on a complete fix.  I'll update everyone once I learn anything more!

------------------------------


>#Update 4:05pm:

> There is a temporary work-around that works for some players:  If you are getting this "unspecified error", make sure to dismiss the error by pressing "continue" and you should be able to Launch normally immediately after without the error popping up again.

------------------------------

Hey everyone,

We've seen a bunch of reports of players getting errors ("Unspecified Error") commonly associated when you download a new patch, but for most players (NA, EUW, EUNE) hasn't actually patched yet.  

The correct reaction is most definitely:  Da fuq?

We're currently digging into this issue right now, but we don't have much to share just yet.  Some individuals on our patcher team initially started to look into it, but as the the investigation started rolling, we've been dragging more and more in Katamari Damacy style.  

Once I get some more information from our teams, I'll make sure to update everyone!

replies.body: My mum has just had to tie me down to my bed this is making me go crazy, I'm hitting my head off the wall, what happens if I miss out on the chroma skins going on sale for IP what will i do with my life? WHAT WILL I DO. I CANT BREATHE I JUST GOT INTO SILVER ONE AFTER PLAYING WITH SO MANY TROLLS THAT WERE DRAGGING ME DOWN. SOMEONE CALL 911, I WANTED GOLD TONIGHT D;{{item:3070}}

M8 I AINT EVEN JOKING THEY SAID ON THE 25TH ALL CHROMA SKINS THAT CAME OUT BEFORE AUGUST WILL BE ABLE TO BE BOUGHT FOR 2000IP EACH

> Update 4:05pm:
> There is a temporary work-around. If you are getting this "unspecified error", make sure to dismiss the error by pressing "continue" and you should be able to Launch normally without the error popping up.

I AM SERIOUSLY FREAKING OUT I DONT KNOW WHAT TO DO I AM GOING TO DIE IF I DONT PLAY LEAGUE TONIGHT GOD HELP US ALL.
Any indication on when this will be resolved I would really like some explaination behind this! I have waited a long work day just to finally come home and play the League of Legends!!!
Yeap.The same thing m8 :)

(SOLVED) 

I was getting the same error... I was on Windows 10 with the Aniversary Update and I removed it and passed to the normal Windows 10 Version and it worked!! Now im patching and opening League of Legends calmly!! I think this a imcompatible version of Windows 10 with LolClient!!! I hope I helped someone!! 
Thanks!

2. _Wait for Riot to post more news_

Been having a connection error when trying to log in since I installed patch 6.16, would this be related to the current issue that is happening or is this a completely seperate issue?
I HAVE UNINSTALLED CMON
So, what is going on.  unexpected error, all the time.

Hitting a certificate error on https://l3cdn.riotgames.com/releases/live/projects/lol_air_client/releases/releaselisting_EUW
Also, in the logs, there is an error: "Peer certificate cannot be authenticated with given CA certificates".

Hope it helps to debug a bit :)

EDIT: Some of my friends cannot reproduce this error. And yes, time is correct on my system.

My client froze and shut down while in a ranked lobby and now it has just happened to my friend in the next lobby we joined (after waiting the 5 minutes). Is this a related issue? Will we be able to get the LP back?

A line in the code did a crossover to the PBE or became a link towards nothing. 
Trust me, i know nothing and as such can't go wrong.

OH MU GOD GUYS I WAS LITERALLY CRYING, your game means so much to me and I really have no other game to play, so when I saw this happening I went like "NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}  I better go {{summoner:1}} my mind now and sleep..." But seriosuly when I saw this post a I got so thankfull... Hope you fix it soon {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

I hope the new patch comes soon. I need Arcade Ahri.

I hope you guys are able to fix the issue and the patch doesn't get pushed back a day or so.
